name: I know what you are? (Local game jam 4/26/2020)
name_original: I know what you are? (Local game jam 4/26/2020)
description:
Explore a surreal and bizarre world with the  A and D keys. Click on objects to figure out their juicy, delectable secrets.  Figure out what in the world this bizarre question mark entity is thinking! Jump into a weird puzzle game for weird people.  

Coding and programing except for the water level done by- me

water level -david
